body:
Hey guys, me and Filip decided to do a joint AMA so please ask away :) 

Brief bit of info about us: 

Lokigh- 17 years old from London, England. Joined Avicus June 2013, also played OCN for a while but inconsistently. 
MeMyselfAndGhost-17 years old from Croatia. Joined Avicus November 2014, but came from OCN beforehand.

Feel free to add us on snapchat; Lokigh- laurencejm1 MeMyselfAndGhost- mmag69

replies.body:
Why does your name auto capitalize on my phone? bcs Lokigh is THE BEST name c:

Favorite drink? Mountain DEWWWW (but they only have the normal flavour here in the U.K I heard they have some cool ones in the U.S :3) I also like WATER 

Have you been moderator/staff on any other server? Yes! Used to be mod on a small prison server when I was 13 and when I was 12 I managed to get helper on quite a big server (like 400-500 players) called ToxicMC and it was a hardcore factions server :) I've also been mod on a few smaller friends servers ;3

Most fun thing about moderating? Talking to other mods in staff chat is always fun... also being able to actually ban people and not have to forum report.

Opinions on fiLip's texture packs? I love them all <3 been using on Filip's packs since January this year :D Although at the moment I am really liking Rose gold by you and Filip :)
 
Do you enjoy answering opinions? I actually really like opinion questions; as long as people ask other questions along with it- like you did c: 

Opinions? ;> OPINION; Really nice mod who always takes reports consistently which helps out the rest of the mods a lot such as myself XD :) As a person you're also very nice, always saying hi in chat and I don't think I've ever seen you be salty or toxic.. yet ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Also, you're really active ingame and in discord which is always good c: You change you skin about 72 times per minute but thats cool XD your IGN is pretty good atm because I kinda disliked APacketOfChips for some unknown reason idk- PAULLLLLINA ftw. Also add me on snapchat ^^ in post description c:

replies.body:
Heya boys :p

To Lokigh and Ghost

  • How are you, really?
  • How do you feel right now? What are you thinking about?
  • What’s your favorite color?
  • What’s your favorite food?
  • What’s your favorite dessert?
  • How old are you?
  • What have you learned today?
  • What is your favorite subject in school?
  • What do you do?
  • What are some of your favorite books?
  • What are some of your favorite movies?
  • What kind of music are you into?
  • If you were going to write a book, what would you call it and what would it be about?
  • What’s one of the scariest things you’ve ever done?
  • What accomplishment are you most proud of?
  • Are you married?
  • How did you meet your spouse / girlfriend / boyfriend?
  • Do you think it’s better to get married when you’re young or better to wait a while?
  • Do you have any kids?
  • Have you ever thought of adopting?
  • When you were a kid, what did you want to be when you grew up?
  • What do you do for fun?
  • Do you like traveling?
  • If you could visit any country in the world, where would you go?
  • Who are some people you’d like to meet someday?
  • If someone asked you to give them a random piece of advice, what would you say?
  • What’s one of your favorite habits you have?
  • What are some things that make you really happy?
  • What are some things that make you really sad?
  • What are some things that scare you?
  • Do you like to plan things out in detail or be spontaneous?
  • Are you a religious person?
  • If you could go back in history, who would you like to meet?
  • Would you rather live in the country or in the city?
  • What was your life like growing up?
  • What were you like in high school?
  • Do you have any brothers or sisters? How many?
  • What’s your favorite part about today so far?
  • Who in your life has influenced you the most? How did they do it?
  • What’s your favorite joke?
  • Have you ever tried sushi? (Did you like it?)
  • Do you like spicy food?
  • How do you like your steak cooked?
  • Do you have a favorite number? Any particular reason why you like that number?
  • If you were a type of animal, what would you be and why?
  • What’s one of the strangest things you’ve ever done?
  • What kind of vacations do you like?
  • What are some of your major goals in life?
  • Do you cry easily?
  • What did you do on your 16th birthday?
  • Would you rather be hated or forgotten?
  • If you knew that you would die tomorrow, what would you do today?
  • What's your favorite band of music
  • Do you see anime?
  • Some opinion about me?
